text: at last year's championships Nelson set
a us record by recalling three hundred
and three digits in order that's like
memorizing 43 phone numbers in just five
minutes how did he do it by mastering a
centuries-old memorization technique
known as PA Oh person action object
person action object is a system where
you take numbers that represent person
action or an object and you combine them
into one mental picture our brains are
wired to recall visual images not
numbers so by converting a string of
digits to a vivid mental picture it
makes it easier for our brain to
remember them so I have a mental
dictionary of a thousand people and from
zero zero zero to nine nine nine I've
given each of those persons one of those
digits I have an action associated with
those guys as well as an object for
example 34 zekiel Anil his action is
dunking and this object is a backboard
this system allows Nelson to convert
strings of digits into easily memorable
images by converting the first two
digits into a person the next two into
an action and the last two an object
for example 48 six six 31:48
is my dog god I look at the next two
digits six six which the person is Satan
but his action is setting fire to
something and then the last two digits
31 which is a redneck hillbilly guy
playing the banjo but his object is a
banjo so I throw that into the mix so I
have 48 66 3 1 it's a dog setting fire
to a banjo one memorable image
it took Nelson months to come up with
his personal set of 3000 people
actions and conscience this dedication
to training could be the key to
capturing another memory title
